name: mrcepid-collapsevariants
title: CollapseVariants
summary: Generates dummy input files for various association testing software

inputSpec.name: filtering_expression
inputSpec.label: filtering expression to filter variants (must be compatible with pandas.query())
inputSpec.help: This must be a pandas.query() compatible filtering expression. See pandas documentation for more information.

inputSpec.name: snplist
inputSpec.label: list of varIDs to use as a custom mask
inputSpec.help: list of varIDs to use as a custom mask. MUST be one variant ID per-line in the format 1:1234:A:T.

inputSpec.name: genelist
inputSpec.label: list of gene symbols to use as a custom mask
inputSpec.help: list of gene symbols to use as a custom mask. MUST be one gene symbol per line. Please note that a filtering expression needs to be provided

inputSpec.name: output_prefix
inputSpec.label: name to append to beginning of output files.
inputSpec.help: This should be a brief descriptor of the type of variants this command is aggregating. i.e. if aggregating PTVs, PTV would be an acceptable parameter.

inputSpec.name: bgen_index
inputSpec.label: list of bgen files to collapse on
inputSpec.help: list of bgen files and associated index/annotation

outputSpec.name: output_tarball
outputSpec.label: VCF-specific tar file with files for associations
outputSpec.help: This will include resulting filtered files that are provided as input to mrcepid-runassociationtesting

outputSpec.name: log_file
outputSpec.label: Log file for this collapsing run
outputSpec.help: Log file with information on this job
